name: Sand Spider
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 14

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sand spider makes one Bite attack and two Impaling Leg attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Impaling Leg
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns, and the sand spider can't use the same Impaling Leg on another target. The sand spider has four Impaling Legs.

special_abilities.name: Sand Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The sand spider has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy terrain.
